channel.title: A collection of things I find inspiring
channel.description: A collection of things I find inspiring

item.title: 580: That's One Way to Do It
item.description:
580: That's One Way to Do It

Forget the easy way. This week, stories about people who come up with very innovative...and unusual...solutions to their problems. Including the story of a young voter who defies political categorization.

item.title: 29-year-old millennial rips the 25-year-old Yelp employee who got fired after complaining about her salary
item.description:
29-year-old millennial rips the 25-year-old Yelp employee who got fired after complaining about her salary

On Friday, a Yelp/Eat24 employee wrote a lengthy blog post to her CEO, Jeremy Stoppelman, about her compensation, which she said came out to about $8 an hour after taxes. A few hours later, she said she was fired.

item.title: 15 Best Space Operas That Aren't Star Wars or Star Trek
item.description:
15 Best Space Operas That Aren't Star Wars or Star Trek

December is here, and while some are gearing up for Christmas, nerds all over the world are getting ready for a far more important moment this month: the release of Star Wars: The Force Awakens .

item.title: Florida thinks learning to code is like studying a foreign language. Here's why it's not.
item.description:
Florida thinks learning to code is like studying a foreign language. Here's why it's not.

Florida thinks learning to code is like studying a foreign language. Here’s why it’s not. - Vox

item.title: 16 Top Marketing Blogs and Publications You Need to Be Following
item.description:
16 Top Marketing Blogs and Publications You Need to Be Following

The marketing industry must constantly evolve alongside the audiences it attempts to reach. Cutting-edge is adequate, and everything else falls by the wayside. I've often said that the one main secret to my success is my possession of an unquenchable thirst for knowledge and curiosity.

item.title: The 37 Best Websites To Learn Something New - Life Learning
item.description:
The 37 Best Websites To Learn Something New - Life Learning

Forget overpriced schools, long days in a crowded classroom, and pitifully poor results. These websites and apps cover myriads of science, art, and technology topics. They will teach you practically anything, from making hummus to building apps in node.js, most of them for free.

Breaking News, Analysis, Politics, Blogs, News Photos, Video, Tech Reviews - TIME.com

item.title: Moz Content - Audit, Measure, and Discover Relevant Content
item.description:
Moz Content - Audit, Measure, and Discover Relevant Content

Moz Content automatically audits and sorts content according to topic, type, and author so you know which tactics are more effective at engaging your target audience.
